nextapp.echo.webcontainer
Interface ClientMessage.Processor

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientPropertiesInputProcessor, ComponentFocusInputProcessor, ComponentInputProcessor
Enclosing class:
ClientMessage
public static interface ClientMessage.Processor

Interface for Processors which may be associated with a specific type of <dir> (directive) element in the XML message. Registered processors will be invoked by ClientMessage.process().

Method Summary
 void process(nextapp.echo.app.util.Context context, org.w3c.dom.Element dirElement)
          Processes a client message directive.

Processes a client message directive.

Parameters:
